display_name: PROMIS Sleep Disturbance: Sleep was restless (past 7 days)
description:
Item from the PROMIS Sleep Disturbance instrument. [Yu L et al, 2012 (PMID: 22250775)](https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pmc/articles/PMC3261577/)
